channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Royal Road Trip with Darcey Bussell
channel.desc: Darcey's adventure concludes in Wales where she visits St David's Cathedral and a royal gold mine in Snowdonia. Last in series.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Highclere
channel.desc: The team mark the centenary of the 5th Earl of Carnarvon's discovery of Tutankhamen's tomb, and prepare for the biggest event of the summer - the Battle Proms.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Garden Rescue
channel.desc: Charlie and Lee are in Fareham to create a relaxing, productive garden for Lisa, Mike and their two boys, inspired by their travels - a space the whole family can enjoy.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Love Your Garden
channel.desc: Alan Titchmarsh and the team are in Folkestone to surprise Isla - a five-year-old who lives with a form of severe epilepsy - with a sensory wonderland packed with fun.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: My Floating Home
channel.desc: In Surrey, Linda and Mark need an upgrade on their cramped floating home and Linda's doing it by herself. Is passion enough to get the job done.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Hold Out A Hand
channel.desc: Hold out a Hand is a powerful short film talking about mental health and suicide within Gypsy and Travellers communities from real lived experience and in their own words.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Zeta One
channel.desc: Tongue-in-cheek Barbarella-style sci-fi caper. Amazonian space women invade Earth in search of a male to propagate their species. Contains nudity and 70s social attitudes.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Blood On Satan's Claw
channel.desc: In 18th-century England, a farmer finds a deformed skull, sparking a sinister influence over the village's youth, who fall under the grip of a demonic force. Folk horror classic.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Country House Auction
channel.desc: A Victorian mirror and some acclaimed works of art go under the hammer. And will an extremely collectable consignment of wine get the auction's juices flowing? Last in series.

channel.title: Mary Millington
channel.desc: from the David Galaxy Affair. A playboy astrologer has to prove his alibi for a years-old robbery. With Mary Millington, Rosemary England and Diana Dors. Contains sexual scenes.

channel.title: Weekend Millionaires
